runs.comm: starts off with a back-of-a-length delivery, and Gambhir takes a single to the left of mid-off
Sehwag pulls, and this is not short enough to be pulled, but he clears mid-on by a fair distance
Kula stays back of a length, gives him room too, but Sehwag misses out on the cut, there is late away movement too
again a short delivery, but he hits it back down the ground, could have just stopped at him

almost a ripper of a catch from Jayasinghe, the debutant. Sehwag looks to go over mid-off, Jayasinghe times the jump perfectly, gets it in his rught hand, but the inertia makes it pop out, but even as he is falling down, he makes two attempts at it. Can't hold onto it, though
full ball, hit powerfully to mid-on and they come through for one
good pace, 139ks but down the leg side, it's a wide
another delivery down the leg side, Sehwag plays it to fine leg, Kula fumbles this time, Sehwag runs on the misfield, and has to put in the dive to get back in
again angling down the pads, the fine leg is square, and he just helps it along, easy four runs
short, off-stump line, punched back to the bowler
short again, middle-stump line, and he punches it to wide of mid-on for one
Gambhir makes room and goes for the almighty shot through the covers, and misses out on a full and wide delivery
full and wide, Gambhir gets the bottom edge as he tries to make contact, and the third man is too square
this one is asking to be hit, short and wide, and Sehwag had given it the full-blooded upper-cut
goes too full this time, flicked over square leg, and he gets a couple
that's drilled over Gambhir's head, half-volley, and powerfully hit. Gambhir had to react quickly
full, angling across, and it is hit too powerfully to mid-off
the plan works for Sanga, he has asked him to bowl across Sehwag from round the stumps and with deep point in place. Sehwag goes for the shot and finds the fielder with precision
back of a length, on the stumps, and hit straight to mid-on
back of a length, angling across Gambhir, he misses in his attempt to run it down to third man
Gambhir steps put, and plays the fullish ball to the left of third man and gets two
length ball, on the pads, in the slot, and he plays the pick-up over midwicket
short delivery, pulled to midwicket and gets a single
back of a length, no room for him, gets a single to cover
cut away powerfully, but deep point is in place. However, they rush through for the second
full ball, hit to the left of mid-on and they come through for one
cheeky shot, sees there is no man behind square on the leg side, and Gambhir kneels across the stump and paddles it fine
slower ball, pitches on a length Gambhir sees it early, and whacks it over cover, good timing
backward point, cover point, short point, they are all spectators... takes it on the full opens the face and finds that small gap... brings up 500 career runs
a swipe across the line this time, gets an inside edge onto his pads
time for Sri Lanka to misfield, Dhoni helps this one straight towards square leg where Kapu lets it go right through
starts off with a slow (not slower, because he this is his first ball) offcutter, on the stumps, he runs it down to third man
another slower ball, kicks at Dhoni, who takes the bottom hand off and runs through for one
another slow delivery, Gambhir is waiting and pulls it over midwicket
faster delivery, and it's a half-volley outside off, and he has pierced the tight offside field
and he has found the gap again, this is slower again, Gambhir opens the bat face, finds enough power, and beats all the three points - cover, backward and short
sharp bouncer, but it's too high
and he beats point again, slower ball and he makes room and cuts to the right of backward point. Take out the wide, and we have four straight boundaries
starts round the stumps, length ball, driven down the ground for one
lovely shot again, Gambhir is hitting just fours - steps out, makes this into a half-volley, slower ball too, and clears the mid-off
another slower ball, he waits and waits, and gets it fine of third man, for a two - 19-ball 50 for him; Sanga got there in 21
he has paddled Mathews for four, he knows the field like the back of his hand, gets across and beats short fine
finally Gambhir plays a dot ball, full, and he gets an inside edge
another dot ball, Gambhir makes room, and the drive can't beat extra cover
Dhoni punches the ball back at the bowler, Jayasuriya dives to his left to field
played through midwicket for one
Jayasuriya goes round the wicket and cramps Gambhir for room, he drives to cover
Gambhir tries to play a reverse paddle sweep but can't connect
driven down the ground to long on for a single
Dhoni tries to sweep but misses and gets hit on the pad
Mathews continues round the stumps, and angles one full delivery across Dhoni, who lets it go and this one is - slightly harshly - called a wide
the Dhoni shot from out of the block hole, but he doesn't connect properly and gets just one to long-off
too cute for his own good, looks for the paddle again, Mathews it full and fast this time, and out goes the leg stump - one paddle too many from Gambhir
nice cover drive right away, to left of sweeper cover and comes back for two
short, and pulled away without trouble to deep square leg
full, across Dhoni, who gets a thick outside edge, but the third man is fine this time
yorker, Yuvraj digs it out, and gets it to the right of the bowler for one
flat and fast, Yuvraj plays it down to long-on for one
Dhoni has found the deep midwicket. Jaya bowls over the wicket, Dhoni dances down the track and times the shot well but - just like Sehwag - places the deep fielder to precision
plays a wristy shot, uppishly, one bounce to mid-on
"Wide???" asks a bemused Jayasuriya, Rohit has hit the cover of the ball while sweeping this one, but it's called wide
helped away to deep fine leg for one
full ball, hit powerfully, to cover, dot ball
excellent fielding at midwicket by Dilshan, Yuvraj connects nicely and Dilshan makes a full-length dive to keep them down to a dot
full ball, across the right-hander from round the stumps, and driven down the ground for one
full ball again, yorker length, and the best he can do is a single to third man

he is run out and he is hurt too, Rohit plays a nice drive to the right of Malinga at third man, and hesitates for just one moment while coming back for the second. The throw is right at the top of the stumps, and what's more he has hurt his shoulder while diving
full delivery, on the stumps, and worked away to the on side
India are coming down in a heap here, length ball, and Yuvraj looks for the straight six. Slight mis-hit, and he has found the long-on fieldsman; Sri Lanka must feel they are home now
length ball, Raina drives it down the ground for a single
Raina takes care of that satistic, slogs Jayasuriya over the midwicket boundary, flat and powerful hit
goes aerial again, and gets just one down to long-off
flat, fired into the pads, Pathan misses but gets a leg-bye. Sri Lanka will be relieved this is not called a wide
yorker length, flat again, and Raina gets a single to cover
and then there were six, Pathan goes for the big hit too, and gets the toe part of the bat, skying it towards Malinga at long-on
Raina sweeps a fullish delivery down to long-on
length ball, driven down the ground, gets a single
fulltoss, driven down the ground for one
yorker again, opens the face and gets a single
he has driven this over point, but gets only a single
fulltoss again and he has driven this down to long-off
another yorker for Raina, and he runs it down to third man for one
Raina steps out and drives him inside-out for one
driven down the ground for one
gets a length ball, and lofts it over wide long-on
seven down, three to go; Raina steps out and goes straight down the ground. At long-on Dilshan takes a nice, safe catch at long-on
Dinda slogs, eyes closed it seems, and misses by a long distance
almost another wicket, falls just short of midwicket
goes for the sweep, and misses
this time he connects with the sweep, and gets one to fine leg
slogged over the leg side for one
gets one into the leg side
Dinda slogs again, but can't beat Dilshan at deep square leg
length ball, pushed to mid-off
yorker, played with an open face
good ol' fashioned slog, gets one to wide of midwicket
first drop from SL but too late, Dinda skies this towards Malinga who misjudges it completely, and lets it go through for four
walks in front of the stumps, and gets it to short fine leg for one
lovely clean straight hit, it is a length delivery and Nehra finds the sweetest part of the bat to hit it with

another six, over long-on this time, again sweetly timed. Nehra is having an Agarkar-esque day: two good overs, two really bad overs, and then hitting some crunchy shots with the bat. This was the 1000th six in international T20s
length ball, driven down the ground for one
wide down the leg side from Malinga. Nehra lets it go Gavaskar-style
Nehra continues the entertainment, plays a little pick-up shot on this length ball and gets two to wide of long-on
this is Malinga's first yorker of the night, and is too much for Nehra
this one is slightly short of being a yorker, and is driven down the ground
another yorker, gets a sharp single to midwicket

what a shot from Nehra, this is a length ball, and he has absolutely drilled it straight back. The umpire has to duck for cover, and the ball reaches the boundary even before you can finish saying wow
SL miss out on a run-out here, limply hit towards cover, but Fernando fails to collect the underarm flick
lovely yorker, missing the leg stump by inches, he gets a bye though
Dinda makes room and swipes, ends up playing a short ball back to the bowler
Dinda makes room and clears point, wants a second but is sent back, then slips while turning but somehow plonks the bat in in time. Gets two overthrows in the bargain
Nehra is run out. He just hits and runs, but Fernando does well to field it to his right and run the stumps down with a direct-hit
Dinda swipes again, and misses, but gets a bye down the leg side
Dinda dances down the track and hits him down the ground for a single
big appeal for lbw, but it is pitched outside leg
Dinda slogs again, but the long-on is placed wide and it will be just a single
Ojha goes for the big slog and misses
this time he goes for the straight hit and connects well for a single
Dinda steps out and hits it back to the bowler this time
short and wide, hit to the right of Dilshan and they take a single
and he has bowled him, with a flat delivery, Dinda slogs again and misses. Can Dilshan finish this before the scheduled finish?
Ishant drives the first ball he faces wide of extra cover and gets four
flat, pushes him into the crease, and pushed down the ground for one
lofted down the ground for a couple

Mathews fails at the Mathews. At long-off, close to the boundary he makes the catch, lobs the ball back in play, goes out, comes back in, catches. But hold on, he realises he has touched the skirting while taking the catch
